name: CD52 molecule
other_names: epididymis secretory sperm binding protein Li 171mP

reactome.name: Post-translational modification: synthesis of GPI-anchored proteins

summary: Involved in positive regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration. Predicted to be located in extracellular region and plasma membrane. Predicted to be intrinsic component of plasma membrane. Predicted to be active in sperm midpiece. [provided by Alliance of Genome Resources, Apr 2022]
